hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services, pricing, and more

search.noResults: No results found. Try different keywords.

questions.a: Matex offers comprehensive technology solutions including AI and machine learning services, custom software development, cloud infrastructure solutions, and technology consulting. We help businesses transform digitally with cutting-edge solutions.
Yes, we develop native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android. Our mobile development services include UI/UX design, development, testing, and deployment.

We use modern technologies including React, Node.js, Python, TypeScript, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and various AI/ML frameworks. Our tech stack is chosen based on project requirements and best practices.

questions.q: Can you help with cloud migration?
questions.a: Absolutely! We provide comprehensive cloud migration services, helping businesses move to AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure. We handle everything from planning to execution and optimization.

questions.q: How much do your services cost?
questions.a: Pricing varies based on project scope, complexity, and requirements. We offer custom quotes tailored to each project. Contact us with your project details, and we'll provide a detailed estimate.
Yes, we offer flexible payment plans for larger projects. We accept payments via PayPal, Wise, and Wish Money. Payment terms are discussed during project planning.

questions.q: Is there a minimum project size?
questions.a: We work with projects of all sizes, from small startups to large enterprises. We'll discuss your needs and provide a solution that fits your budget and requirements.
We regularly post open positions on our Careers page, including full-time roles and internships. Check our Careers page for the latest opportunities in engineering, product management, and more.
Yes, many of our positions offer remote work options. We have offices in Lebanon and France, but we support remote work for qualified candidates.

Submit your application through our Careers page with your resume and cover letter. Our team reviews applications and contacts qualified candidates for interviews. The process typically takes 1-2 weeks.
You can reach us via email at contact@matexsolution.com or call us at +961 76162549. You can also use our AI chatbot for quick answers or fill out the contact form on our website.
We have offices in Baabda, Mount Lebanon (Lebanon) and Paris, France. We also support remote work and serve clients globally.
Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM (GMT+2). However, we're available for urgent matters and can schedule consultations outside these hours.

questions.q: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
questions.a: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance services for all our projects. This includes bug fixes, updates, performance optimization, and technical support.
We follow agile development methodologies, using Scrum and Kanban frameworks. We emphasize iterative development, regular communication, and client collaboration throughout the project.

questions.q: How do you ensure code quality?
questions.a: We maintain high code quality through code reviews, automated testing, continuous integration, and following industry best practices. All code is thoroughly tested before deployment.
